channel.title: Book Talk on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Book Talk on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: People Are Trying to ‘Deprogram’ Their MAGA Parents Through Book Clubs
item.description: Divisive politics have led people to go “no contact” with their right-wing parents. Some hope reading together could help bridge the gap.
